A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was probably the most intense Star Wars film I've ever seen. Definitely an improvement over TFA. Lots of action-packed scenes and surprises. Was surprised to see Leia actually use the force for possibly the only time. Snoke and Phasma shouldn't have been killed off this early as they had so much potential. Overall\, though\, I loved it and should really make Episode IX interesting. Oh\, and the porgs were just too adorable :P
